components/product/product-item:
{{name}}

{{> components/product/price price=price show_savings=false schema_org=false show_tax_labels=true price_as_low_as=settings.price_as_low_as sale_badges=settings.product_sale_badges }}
{{#if show_rating}} {{> components/product/product-rating rating=rating total=num_reviews}} {{{snippet 'product_rating'}}} {{/if}}
components/product/product-rating:
{{#enumerate 1 5}} {{#compare ../this.rating this operator='>='}} {{else}} {{/compare}} {{/enumerate}}
{{this.rating}} {{#if this.total}} ({{this.total}}) {{/if}}
